entry.title: I Received My Degree
entry.content:
I’ve just noticed that I was awarded a Distinction for my Master’s degree. I am very excited because it’s not very easy, especially for an overseas student whose first language is not English.

I can remember the hard time during the exam session, I sometimes worked day and night for the purpose of getting the highest mark as possible, and the teamwork with some of my classmates and friends, which is very interesting and valuable.

Now I’ve got what I want, and will continue to work hard to achieve my next goal.
